column4: hi! since feisty is almost stable, I don't need a separate ubuntu testing partition anymore. so now I need to install another distribution to play with. any ideas? is the new debian somehow exciting?
or that OLPC OS...but I think it's LiveCD-only
already tried gentoo some times, but I don't like the compiling times :-) I've ran the OLPC OS through vmware, might be cool to try newer versions...
